title.rendered: Amazon Reimbursements Part 1 with Chaim Morgan of Refundsniper.com

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 33:24 — 30.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 33:24 — 30.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Chaim Morgan is the Director of Business Development for RefundSniper. Hailing from a strong foundational background in the e-commerce and technology sectors, Chaim brings an extensive knowledge of the Amazon platform to the company. Find out how RefundSniper can be beneficial to your business.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How to reconcile your Amazon account
  • Who RefundSniper is intended for
  • What the typical sizes of reimbursements are
  • The classic inventory management errors
